mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, PRODUCTCODE, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTPRICE, IMGNAME, CONTENTIMGNAME, PRODUCTTYPE FROM (SELECT A.PRODUCTCODE, A.PRODUCTNAME, A.PRODUCTPRICE, A.IMGNAME, A.CONTENTIMGNAME, B.PRODUCTTYPE FROM PRODUCT_INFO A JOIN PRODUCT B ON (A.PRODUCTCODE = B.PRODUCTCODE) ORDER BY B.PRODUCTTYPE, A.PRODUCTCODE)) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{section}-1)*80 + (#{pageNum}-1)*8 +1 and (#{section}-1)*80 + (#{pageNum}) * 8
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_INFO A JOIN PRODUCT B ON (A.PRODUCTCODE = B.PRODUCTCODE)
